description.narrative: This activity (Strengthening the Kyrgyz political system) is a component of Governance in Action reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £6,693,489. This component benefits Kyrgyzstan, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Democratic participation and civil society. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-04-2015 and the end date is 30-09-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
